Articles.Content:
Hi Mods, Is it possible for us to have a greater capacity for storing both sent and received messages in our accounts?

If not, would it be possible to have an alert when the capacity is reached? From what I can tell when you reach your limits then you can't receive anymore PM's, but you don't know about it until you try to send one yourself.

Thanks

To the best of my knowledge, it does send an alert -- at least, I got one myself not five days ago, and had to go through and delete some old messages. Maybe check if your user settings permit the forum software sending you emails -- that's how it does the alerts, as far as I can tell.
By the way, the message will say it's your inbox which is full even if it's actually the outbox that's the problem. That baffled me for a couple of days until I figured out what was going on.
